item.title: About
item.description: Summary Accomplished tech industry professional with measurable success planning and implementing complex software development and infrastructure projects using a range of programming languages, operating systems, and tools. Skills Expertise Areas: Software Development, Microservices, Cloud Technologies, Automation, Data Engineering, Data Analytics/Visualization and Technology Leadership Languages: Python, Typescript, Javascript, Go, SQL, C/C++, Java, R Cloud: AWS, Terraform, Kubernetes, Docker Networking: TCP/IP, DNS, NFS, SMB, Network Design, Packet Analysis and Troubleshooting Databases: Snowflake, Spatial Databases, Postgres/PostGIS, MySQL, MSSQL
